# json-formatter

Format and validate JSON files

## Quick Start

```bash
cd json-formatter
python main.py --install  # Install globally (optional)
python main.py --help     # Show usage
```

## Usage

```bash
python main.py file.json --pretty
```

## Features

- format
- validate
- minify

## Install

```bash
# Global install
./install.sh
```

## Uninstall

```bash
./uninstall.sh  # if exists
```
